name: Snagit Style Archive
summary: Learn about .SNAGSTYLES files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: For example, a SNAGSTYLES file might determine how arrows, talk bubbles, lines, shapes, and pen lines appear in Snagit. Styles are often used across multiple images, to ensure elements added to those images use the same colors, shadow settings, line weight, etc.
NOTE: In more recent versions of Snagit, SNAGSTYLES files have been replaced by .SNAGTHEME files.

instructions: You can open a SNAGSTYLES in Snagit by dragging the file to the Snagit icon in your computer's taskbar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
